name: Lila

services.title: Product Management
services.description: I am passionate about turning complex ideas into successful, user-centered products, with a particular focus in product that are usable, useful, and (of course) used.

services.title: Product Design
services.description: I'm passionate about creating intuitive, elegant product designs that delight users and solve real-world problems.

services.title: Data Science
services.description: I love to implement data-driven solutions to complex business problems, leveraging my expertise in statistics, machine learning, and data visualization.

services.title: Analytics & Strategy
services.description: I specialize in leveraging data analytics to develop strategic insights that drive business growth and improve operational efficiency.

aboutpara:
My name's Lila. I'm a Program Manager at Amazon Web Services working in Business & Product Operations. 

I graduated from Northwestern University, where I studied Sociology, Data Science, and Human Computer Interaction. I'm passionate about solving problems with data and designing solutions and products that are useful, usable, and used.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  Hey! Here are a few of my experiences at a glance
resume.description: If you'd like to learn more, feel free to send me a message by clicking the "Contact" button above.

experiences.bullets: Based in AWS Business & Product Operations unit and the Funding Operations team
Based in the AWS Partner Network's Tri-Party Initiative team, Building GTM solutions for software and consulting Partners.

experiences.position: Special Projects - Consulting, Unite the World With Africa Foundation
experiences.bullets: Assisting with Program and design strategy @ Unite the World With Africa Foundation. Learn more about their work @ https://www.uniteafricafoundation.org/

Nonviolence & violence prevention research @ CORNERS (Center for Neighborhood Science for Neighborhood Solutions) at Northwestern University. Learn more about their work @ https://www.cornersresearch.org/

experiences.position: Data & Research, Institute for Nonviolence Chicago (INVC)
experiences.bullets: Nonviolence & violence prevention research @ INVC (Institute for Nonviolence Chicago). Learn more about their work @ https://www.nonviolencechicago.org/

experiences.position: Campus Chief Operating Officer (COO), Brewbike Inc.
experiences.bullets: Wore many hats (Operations Analyst / Campus Marketer / Barista). Culminated in a year as the Campus Chief Operating Officer (COO) overseeing two on-site cafes. Learn more about Brewbike @ https://brewbikecoffee.com/

Assembled a great team and built an open source speaker platform on career exposure. Now serving 10+ schools across East Africa and thousands of students. Learn more @ https://www.uniteafricafoundation.org/the-unite-passion-project
Worked under a Federal District Court Judge to conduct legal research on equity.

experiences.position: Tinkerer, Propel Cohort @ Northwestern's The Garage
experiences.bullets: Accepted first into the Tinkerer Program at The Garage (Northwestern's entrepreneurial incubator) for my ventures in the social impact space. Later accepted into the Propel Program (accelerator for female founders)

experiences.position: Founder & Director, Unite Youth Ambassador Program
experiences.bullets: Assembled a great team and built an international mentorship and co-collaboration program for university and A-Level students in the U.S. and Tanzania. Learn more @ https://www.uniteafricafoundation.org/unites-youth-ambassador-program

education.universityPara: Graduated Magna Cum Laude (3.94 cumulative GPA) and studied Sociology, Data Science (Concentration in Python) and Human Computer Interaction

others: AWS Cloud Practitioner Certified (Amazon Web Services, 2024)
Product Owner Certified (Six Sigma Global Institute, 2022)
Scrum Master Certified (Six Sigma Global Institute, 2022)
